Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: サレ
Entry.EnglishText: Saleh

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: ジルバ
Entry.EnglishText: Zilva

Entry.JapaneseText: アガーテ
Entry.EnglishText: Agarte

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア城
Entry.EnglishText: Callegea Castle

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア城
Entry.EnglishText: Callegea Castle

Entry.JapaneseText: 広間の前を通るのは危険だ。 左から回り込もう。
Entry.EnglishText: It's too dangerous to go through the main hall. We need to go around from the left.

Entry.JapaneseText: どこへ行くのかな、 ドブネズミくんたち？
Entry.EnglishText: Now where might you pack of rats be scurrying off to?

Entry.JapaneseText: サレ!! クレアをどこへやった!?
Entry.EnglishText: Saleh! Where are you keeping Claire?!

Entry.JapaneseText: さあ、 どこだったかな……
Entry.EnglishText: Hm, where might she be indeed...

Entry.JapaneseText: ふざけるな!!
Entry.EnglishText: Don't play games with me!

Entry.JapaneseText: ふざけてるのはキミたちだろう？ お城に忍び込んだあげく、 国に仕える僕に、重要機密を バラせと迫ってるんだからさ。
Entry.EnglishText: You are the ones playing games, are you not? Breaking into the castle and then demanding that I, a loyal servant of this Kingdom, betray secrets of utmost importance.

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺は陛下にお話したい事があるのだ。 どけ……
Entry.EnglishText: There's something that I wish to speak with Her Majesty about. Step aside.

Entry.JapaneseText: 僕を誰だと思ってるのかな？ <Blue>四星<White>のサレだよ。 そう言われて、おとなしくボクが どくとでも思ってるのかい？
Entry.EnglishText: Have you forgotten who I am? I am Saleh of the <Blue>Four Stars<White>. Do you really think you can ask me to obediently step aside?

Entry.JapaneseText: だったら、 おまえを倒すまでだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Then we're prepared to bring you down.

Entry.JapaneseText: その必死な目……キライだな。 キミみたいな人を見ると、 もっといじめたくなるんだよね、僕。
Entry.EnglishText: Such desperation in your eyes... How revolting. When I see someone like you, it just makes me want to torment them even more.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何事か？
Entry.EnglishText: What is going on here?

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたは……<Eugene>？ どうしてここに……
Entry.EnglishText: Aren't you...<Eugene>? What are you doing here...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 陛下！ 陛下が今、何をなされようと しているのか、その真意のほどを お聞かせ願いたいのです！ どうか、私にお時間を！
Entry.EnglishText: Your Majesty! I am here only because I wish to find out the truth behind your recent actions. I'm begging you, grant me an audience!

Entry.JapaneseText: 侵入者だ。捕らえよ！
Entry.EnglishText: They are intruders. Seize them!

Entry.JapaneseText: 待ってジルバ。 わたくしに<Eugene>と 話をさせて。
Entry.EnglishText: Wait, Zilva. Allow me to speak with <Eugene>.

Entry.JapaneseText: しかし、あの者たちが ここに来たのは……
Entry.EnglishText: But these people came here to...

Entry.JapaneseText: わかっています。 でも、<Eugene>は 話の通じない人ではありません。 きっとわかってくれるわ。
Entry.EnglishText: I am aware of that. However, <Eugene> is a reasonable man. I am sure he will come to understand.

Entry.JapaneseText: 陛下……
Entry.EnglishText: Your Majesty...

Entry.JapaneseText: この先の通路には 見張りがいる。
Entry.EnglishText: There are guards further down this route.

Entry.JapaneseText: 左の通路から 回り込んでいこう。
Entry.EnglishText: Let's go around from the left passage.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『開かない扉』 扉にはカギがかかっている。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Closed Door - The door is locked.
